title: Five Arrested On Drug Charges In Fayette County
content:
Sheriff Vernon Stanforth stopped a Honda Accord for an equipment violation and found the driver, Dylan Campbell of Greenfield, had a suspended driver's license. 

During a pat-down search, the sheriff found Campbell had drug paraphernalia. 

Four other people in the car also were arrested when the investigation turned up more drug paraphernalia, marijuana, heroin and a large amount of cash.
